roleset.name: to demand, take

example.name: transitive
example.text: In another , she requisitioned topiary MX missile cones -- costing $ 10,000 each -- in heights up to 20 feet .

propbank.arg: topiary MX missile cones -- costing $ 10,000 each -- in heights up to 20 feet

example.name: Within LVC, args 0 & 1
example.text: He made a midnight requisition of all the printers he could lay hands on so that he could monitor all the telephone lines coming into the lab 's computers .

propbank.arg: of all the printers he could lay hands on
so that he could monitor all the telephone lines coming into the lab 's computers

example.name: All arguments
example.text: State electricity boards ( SEBs ) reduced their requisition of electricity from the central utility 's plants .

roleset.note: REQUISITION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'requisition' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from requisition.01-v predicate notes)
REQUISITION-N NOTES: Based on verb entry require.01; corresponds to Vncls order-60-1, require-103. (from requisition.01-n)
